                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%98%B2%E9%83%A8%E6%AD%A3%E5%91%8A%E6%B0%91%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%9A%E5%BD%93%E5%B1%80%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E7%8E%A9%E7%81%AB%23&amp;from=default">#国防部正告民进党当局不要玩火#</a>】28日，国防部例行记者会上，有记者提问：解放军继2月9日进行海空战备巡航后，又于10日在台湾东南部海域组织联合演练。台行政部门负责人称，大陆深受新冠肺炎疫情影响，仍派军机绕台，不但引发台湾民众反感，也影响地区和平。请问对此有何评论？<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;吴谦：东部战 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwkItbuhS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477061332738036:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477061332738036&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>
                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国防部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232020%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%8A%E5%8D%8A%E5%B9%B4%E5%BE%81%E5%85%B5%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#2020年上半年征兵工作推迟#</a>至下半年一并组织实施】记者：今年初，国防部发布消息称，义务兵征集将由一年一次征兵一次退役，调整为一年两次征兵两次退役。请问当前疫情是否影响2020年征兵工作？<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;吴谦：根据国家疫情防控工作决策部署，切实把人民群众生命安全和身体健康放在第一位，按 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwkDCDzlF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477058329430675:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477058329430675&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609308164&amp;ssig=W1S0Lf0FdI" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477055238221715" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwkyDyuQj?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 21:30" date="1582896610000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477055238221715:fromprofile"> 2月28日 21:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A9%AC%E8%83%8C%E4%B8%8A%E7%9A%8490%E5%90%8E%E5%AE%A3%E4%BC%A0%E5%91%98%23&amp;from=default">#马背上的90后宣传员#</a>】90后姑娘米力德尔·杰克森是新疆的一名志愿者，她的村子地广人稀，大喇叭不能覆盖所有村户，于是她骑马进行流动宣传。不仅如此，她还承担起了邮递员的责任，为偏远群众送去防护用品和生活物资。大家都亲切称她为“马背上的宣传员”。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E6%96%B0%E7%96%86%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网新疆频道">@人民网新疆频道</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4477055238221715:1034-video:1034%3A4477015764697096:page_100206_home:2286908003:4477055238221715:2286908003" title="人民网新疆频道的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67qZ6gX" alt="http://t.cn/A67qZ6gX" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网新疆频道的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477052717937921" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwkuzxj0Z?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 21:20" date="1582896010000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477052717937921:fromprofile"> 2月28日 21:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%80%81%E5%AE%8C%E7%89%9B%E7%BE%8A%E8%82%89%E5%86%8D%E9%80%81%E7%81%AB%E9%94%85%E5%BA%95%E6%96%99%23&amp;from=default">#送完牛羊肉再送火锅底料#</a> 内蒙古军区捐14吨物资】近日，为了让武汉人民吃上新鲜的牛羊肉、奶制品，内蒙古军区和内蒙古自治区退役军人事务厅等单位联合捐赠了14吨牛羊肉、火锅底料等物资。工作人员说：“前段时间牛羊肉刚发出，火锅底料随后就到，咱内蒙捐物资都是成套的！”（人民铁道） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iwkuzxj0Z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477052717937921:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477052717937921&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477050641058291" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwkre4rjd?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 21:11" date="1582895515000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477050641058291:fromprofile"> 2月28日 21:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【伊朗卫生部长：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8B%E5%91%A8%E5%B0%86%E6%98%AF%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%88%86%E5%8F%91%E9%AB%98%E5%B3%B0%E6%9C%9F%23&amp;from=default">#下周将是伊朗疫情爆发高峰期#</a>】据伊朗国家电视台28日报道，伊朗卫生部长纳马基表示：数据显示，下周将是伊朗新冠肺炎疫情的爆发高峰期，呼吁全体民众减少出行。伊朗已进口口罩、防护服等，相关工厂也在加紧生产，29日起药店有足够库存可供购买。同时，伊朗全国学校 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iwkre4rjd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477050641058291:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477050641058291&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%81%AB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E5%BA%9F%E5%BC%83%E7%89%A9%E5%8E%BB%E5%93%AA%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#火神山医疗废弃物去哪了#</a> 解密垃圾处理全程】火神山医院自收治患者以来，院区每天产生约500桶各类垃圾，其中包括大量医疗废弃物。医护人员要把医废垃圾打包，封两次口，防止气溶胶喷出，送至专用的医废垃圾桶，然后在医院内进行无害化处理。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E5%86%9B%E4%BA%8B?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视军事">@央视军事</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4477045431949829:1034-video:1034%3A4476998278643746:page_100206_home:2286908003:4477045431949829:2286908003" title="央视军事的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67GnY4K" alt="http://t.cn/A67GnY4K" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视军事的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【疫情当前警察不退！他们以生命守护着生命！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/16/2018new_lazhu_org.png" title="[蜡烛]" alt="[蜡烛]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;截至2月25日，全国公安机关在抗击疫情和维护社会稳定工作中已经有49名民警辅警因公牺牲。致敬英雄！相关单位务必让基层公安人员劳逸结合，保护好我们的英雄，希望数字不再上升！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%AD%A6%E6%B0%91%E6%90%BA%E6%89%8B%E5%90%8C%E8%A1%8C?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=警民携手同行">@警民携手同行</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4477036368196734:1034-video:1034%3A4476955786149904:page_100206_home:2286908003:4477036368196734:2286908003" title="警民携手同行的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67GwryC" alt="http://t.cn/A67GwryC" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>警民携手同行的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：被禁赛8年，支持孙杨上诉】“暴力抗检”是否属实？孙杨该不该被禁赛，或者该不该被禁赛8年？尚需瑞士联邦法院裁决。期待孙杨用更专业的力量维护自身合法权益，也期待孙杨挺住，正如他所称的，越是艰难处，越要有迎难而上的勇气，越要相信，困难会过去，风雨会平息。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4477032589477279:1022-article:1022%3A2309354477032611315916:page_100206_home:2286908003:4477032589477279:2286908003" title="人民网评：被禁赛8年，支持孙杨上诉" href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354477032611315916" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354477032611315916" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>人民网评：被禁赛8年，支持孙杨上诉</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477030580342720" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwjUS1r9K?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 19:52" date="1582890732000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477030580342720:fromprofile"> 2月28日 19:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%98%BF%E5%A1%9E%E6%8B%9C%E7%96%86%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#阿塞拜疆确诊首例新冠肺炎病例#</a>】据阿塞拜疆政府今天发布的消息：阿塞拜疆境内确诊了首例新冠肺炎病例。据介绍，该名患者为俄罗斯公民，前不久从伊朗入境阿塞拜疆。目前该患者在特殊隔离病房内接受治疗，病情较为稳定。阿塞拜疆政府相关部门目前正在加紧排查与该患者接触过的人员，以防止病毒进一步 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwjUS1r9K" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477030580342720:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477030580342720&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3863855894" usercard="id=3863855894">水手怕水06</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%8D%E5%AF%B9%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%B8%E4%B9%85%E5%B1%85%E7%95%99%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%9D%A1%E4%BE%8B%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%23&amp;from=default">#反对外国人永久居留管理条例通过#</a> 3月27日前，（进入网站www.moj.gov.cn、www.chinalaw.gov.cn、www.12348.gov.cn）或发邮件至YJJL2020@chinalaw.gov.cn进不去网站的可以发邮箱！直接说反对 不要提意见！提意见就约等于同意了！！直接提反对 不要提意见！不要用qq邮箱用163、162邮箱都是可以的！        </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609308164&amp;ssig=W1S0Lf0FdI" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477029678533175" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwjTpzNRR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 19:48" date="1582890517000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477029678533175:fromprofile"> 2月28日 19:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%81%E5%A4%8F%E9%87%8D%E5%A4%A7%E7%AA%81%E5%8F%91%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E5%8D%AB%E7%94%9F%E4%BA%8B%E4%BB%B6%E8%B0%83%E6%95%B4%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%23&amp;from=default">#宁夏重大突发公共卫生事件调整为二级响应#</a>】2月28日，宁夏回族自治区政府召开常务会议，根据国家有关法律法规规定和当前新冠肺炎疫情防控形势，自治区人民政府决定，自2020年2月28日18时起 ，将宁夏重大突发公共卫生事件一级响应调整为二级响应。 ​​​​<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E5%AE%81%E5%A4%8F%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网宁夏频道">@人民网宁夏频道</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E6%B0%91%E6%94%BF%E5%B1%80%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E9%AB%98%E6%9E%B6%E8%B7%AF%E4%B8%8E%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E5%90%8C%E5%90%8D%23&amp;from=default">#青岛民政局回应高架路与病毒同名#</a>：2011年命名，命名合规合法】近日，多名网友呼吁青岛的新冠高架路改名。“绝不能起病毒的名字”“继续叫下去太不吉利”。青岛市民政局：新冠高架桥2011年由市政府命名，命名合法合规。为了保持地名的稳定性，一般不予更改。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%96%B0%E4%BA%AC%E6%8A%A5%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=新京报我们视频">@新京报我们视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4477027451051967:2017607-video:2017607%3A4476735123554325:page_100206_home:2286908003:4477027451051967:2286908003" title="新京报我们视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A67GJqhf" alt="http://t.cn/A67GJqhf" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>新京报我们视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477022522647514" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwjHSb6JQ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 19:20" date="1582888811000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477022522647514:fromprofile"> 2月28日 19:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【复工复产，来看各地“硬核”操作】江苏鼓励企业应用工业互联网平台在线复工复产；浙江全面启动“一图一码一指数”，建立起覆盖全省的复工复产监测体系；北京鼓励弹性工作制；甘肃供销联社专门建立紧急调运机制；福建出台九项举措防止农产品积压…各地为有序复工复产实招频出。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4477022522647514:1022-article:1022%3A2309354477022544986325:page_100206_home:2286908003:4477022522647514:2286908003" title="政府出实招&nbsp;企业谋创新&nbsp;各地有序复工复产劲头..." href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354477022544986325" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354477022544986325" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>政府出实招&nbsp;企业谋创新&nbsp;各地有序复工复产劲头...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477020073613803" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwjDVfa79?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 19:10" date="1582888226000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477020073613803:fromprofile"> 2月28日 19:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%AD%89%E5%9C%B0%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E8%A7%84%E5%AE%9A%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%96%E5%85%AC%E6%B0%91%E4%B8%80%E8%A7%86%E5%90%8C%E4%BB%81%23&amp;from=default">#北京等地防控规定中外公民一视同仁#</a>】有媒体在28日举行的外交部记者会上问及，这是否意味着中国各地全面升级针对外国公民的入境限制措施？对此，中国外交部发言人赵立坚表示，北京等地有关防控规定适用于来自或去过境外疫情严重地区的所有入境人员，对中国公民和外国公民一视同仁，这些非常 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwjDVfa79" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477020073613803:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477020073613803&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5125092895" usercard="id=5125092895">一个艹民</a>：一视同仁可以，但是不能放宽外国人（特别是低端洋人，垃圾，极端宗教）进来，中国国籍，只能赋予祖辈都出生于这块土地上的人们！永远记住一点～中国不是移民发展起来的移民国家！中国是全体中国人的中国！        </div>

                                                                                                                        【孙杨回应被禁赛：孙杨已委托律师提起上诉】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%AD%99%E6%9D%A8?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=孙杨">@孙杨</a> ：我刚刚训练完毕，我一直坚信自己的清白。收到国际体育仲裁院的裁决结果，我感到震惊，愤怒，不能理解！<br>我明明按照兴奋剂检查的各项规定，积极配合，只是因为检查人员不具备资质，他们当时自己也承认了这一点，所以同意不带走血样，怎么就成了我的 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwjBCcHBo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477018643027546:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477018643027546&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B4%B5%E5%B7%9E%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%A9%E9%A2%A0%E5%8B%BA%E7%82%92%E6%B2%B9%E8%8C%B6%E5%81%9A%E6%9A%96%E5%BF%83%E9%A4%90%23&amp;from=default">#贵州男孩颠勺炒油茶做暖心餐#</a> 送给防疫人员<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，贵州一六年级小学生完成课业后，在家掌勺当起了大厨。油茶、汤圆、煮鸡蛋…他做这些好吃的是为了送给辛劳值守的防疫人员。这大厨一当就是十几天，“自己要好好读书，将来也为国家献一份力！”<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E5%B9%B3%E5%87%A1%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#战疫中的平凡人#</a><a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%81%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=青流视频">@青流视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4477014649661395:2017607-video:2017607%3A4476970415882244:page_100206_home:2286908003:4477014649661395:2286908003" title="青流视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A67GccOw" alt="http://t.cn/A67GccOw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>青流视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4477011961183105" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwjqQ4XMl?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 18:38" date="1582886293000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4477011961183105:fromprofile"> 2月28日 18:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%BE%AE%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E5%85%8D%E5%BE%815%E4%B8%AA%E6%9C%88%E7%A4%BE%E4%BF%9D%E8%B4%B9%23&amp;from=default">#广东中小微企业免征5个月社保费#</a>】广东省人社厅等多部门联合印发意见，将阶段性减免企业养老保险、失业保险、工伤保险费，同时阶段性减征职工基本医疗保险费。其中，中小微企业、以单位形式参保的个体工商户划型后符合享受免征政策的，2月至6月的单位缴费予以免征；大型企业及其他单位2月至4月的单 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwjqQ4XMl" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477011961183105:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477011961183105&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8D%9753%E4%B8%AA%E8%B4%AB%E5%9B%B0%E5%8E%BF%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E8%84%B1%E8%B4%AB%23&amp;from=default">#河南53个贫困县全部脱贫#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%B3%E6%88%982020%23&amp;from=default">#决战2020#</a>经河南省脱贫攻坚领导小组审议，省政府第77次常务会议研究，正式批准嵩(sōng)县、汝阳县、鲁山县、范县、台前县、卢氏县、南召县、淅川县、社旗县、桐柏县、淮滨县等14个县退出贫困县序列。至此，全省53个贫困县全部实现脱贫摘帽。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A67bx7eu" alt="http://t.cn/A67bx7eu" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E5%BF%AB%E8%AE%AF%23&amp;from=default">#人民网快讯#</a>【中国游泳协会表态：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E5%AD%99%E6%9D%A8%E7%BB%A7%E7%BB%AD%E7%BB%B4%E6%8A%A4%E5%90%88%E6%B3%95%E6%9D%83%E7%9B%8A%23&amp;from=default">#支持孙杨继续维护合法权益#</a>】对国际体育仲裁法庭（CAS）就世界反兴奋剂机构（WADA）上诉国际泳联反兴奋剂小组和<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%99%E6%9D%A8%23&amp;from=default">#孙杨#</a> 一案做出的裁决，我们深表遗憾。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;中国游泳协会一贯坚持对使用兴奋剂“零容忍”，一贯重视加强运动员反兴奋剂教育。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;我们了解，2018 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iwjavawze" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4477001832508472:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4477001832508472&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5252027910" usercard="id=5252027910">要努力学习不要秃头的溜溜</a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member5"></em></a>：希望朋友们永远记住，不要因为某些人泼的脏水就毁坏了孙杨在大家心目中的形象。这个人，过去的20多年，每一分每一秒都在为了游泳奋斗，他的辉煌不应因为某些人一面之词消失。 不在你成功时慕名而来，也不在你低谷时转身离开。        </div>

    </div>

        <div class="WB_feed_detail clearfix" node-type="feed_content" style="background-image:url(//vip.storage.weibo.com/feed_cover/star_1218_pc_x2.png?version=8360e4a841c8aaec)">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609308173&amp;ssig=JS30QL%2FQuV" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4476999592988523" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwj6TcxrZ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 17:49" date="1582883343000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476999592988523:fromprofile"> 2月28日 17:49</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%91%E6%9C%9F%E8%87%AA%E9%9F%A9%E6%9D%A5%E5%8D%8E%E4%B9%98%E5%AE%A2%E5%A4%9A%E4%B8%BA%E5%9C%A8%E9%9F%A9%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%85%AC%E6%B0%91%23&amp;from=default">#近期自韩来华乘客多为在韩中国公民#</a>】近期，网络上关于自韩赴华航班爆满等消息很多。对此，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%8F%91%E8%A8%80%E4%BA%BA%E8%B5%B5%E7%AB%8B%E5%9D%9A%23&amp;from=default">#外交部发言人赵立坚#</a>今天表示：自疫情发生后，由于航空公司缩减航班，客观上导致了一些自韩来华航班满座。据了解，近期自韩来华的乘客绝大多数是在韩中国公民。中韩是友好邻邦，当前都处在全力抗击 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iwj6TcxrZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476999592988523:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476999592988523&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609308173&amp;ssig=JS30QL%2FQuV" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4476997936344939" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwj4dqCBJ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 17:42" date="1582882948000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476997936344939:fromprofile"> 2月28日 17:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F2020%E5%B9%B4%E9%9D%A2%E5%90%91%E6%B8%AF%E6%BE%B3%E5%8F%B0%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E7%94%9F%E6%8B%9B%E7%94%9F%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%23&amp;from=default">#推迟2020年面向港澳台研究生招生考试#</a>】教育部有关部门发布通知，为落实疫情防控有关要求，保障师生生命安全和身体健康，原定4月18日至19日举行的2020年面向香港、澳门、台湾地区研究生招生考试推迟举行，具体工作安排等事宜将视疫情防控进展情况另行通知。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A67GRKgN" alt="http://t.cn/A67GRKgN" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4476996199765655" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwj1pEYuz?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 17:35" date="1582882535000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476996199765655:fromprofile"> 2月28日 17:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%A4%E5%B9%B4%E5%86%85%E6%89%BE%E5%88%B0%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E6%8C%89%E5%BA%94%E5%B1%8A%E5%8A%9E%E7%90%86%E5%B0%B1%E4%B8%9A%E6%89%8B%E7%BB%AD%23&amp;from=default">#两年内找到工作按应届办理就业手续#</a>】28日教育部副部长翁铁慧表示，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8A%E5%B9%B4%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E7%94%9F%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%AD%94%E8%BE%A9%E5%8F%AF%E9%80%82%E5%BD%93%E5%BB%B6%E9%95%BF%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#今年研究生毕业答辩可适当延长时间#</a>；在学校保留档案的毕业生，两年内找到工作按应届办理就业手续。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a> 你是在毕业前还是毕业后找到工作的？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4476996199765655:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_337503_-_93b0c7" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_337503_-_93b0c7" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_337503_-_93b0c7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国家知识产权局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A9%B3%E5%9B%9E%E7%81%AB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E9%9B%B7%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%95%86%E6%A0%87%E6%B3%A8%E5%86%8C%E7%94%B3%E8%AF%B7%23&amp;from=default">#驳回火神山雷神山商标注册申请#</a>】近日，一些申请人将与疫情防控相关的“火神山”“雷神山”“瑞德西韦”“李文亮”及包含“新冠”字样的标志等申请商标注册，引发各界广泛关注与热议。截至目前，已有6家市场主体提交的19件涉及防治新冠肺炎的商标注册申请进入“绿色通道”，予以快 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwiXf5RW1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476993611398969:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476993611398969&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609308173&amp;ssig=JS30QL%2FQuV" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4476993485980827" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwiX2p5SX?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 17:24" date="1582881888000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476993485980827:fromprofile"> 2月28日 17:24</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【转发祝福！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2395%E5%90%8E%E6%8F%B4%E6%B1%89%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E9%9B%B7%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%88%90%E5%A9%9A%23&amp;from=default">#95后援汉护士雷神山医院成婚#</a>】28日，来自上海交通大学医学院附属仁济医院的于景海护士和周玲亿护士，在大家的祝福和见证下，终于“如期”举行婚礼。这对“95后”新人原定于2月14日领证，2月28日举办婚礼。一场突如其来的新冠肺炎疫情彻底打乱了他们的计划，两人更是积极响应医院号召驰援 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwiX2p5SX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476993485980827:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476993485980827&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月28日 17:26</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4476991216989227"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1144</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E6%80%81%E5%8A%BF%E5%90%91%E5%A5%BD%23&amp;from=default">#全国疫情防控态势向好#</a>，但<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%BD%A2%E5%8A%BF%E4%BE%9D%E7%84%B6%E4%B8%A5%E5%B3%BB%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E7%9B%B2%E7%9B%AE%E4%B9%90%E8%A7%82%23&amp;from=default">#疫情形势依然严峻不能盲目乐观#</a>】国家卫健委疫情应对处置工作专家组组长梁万年：全国疫情防控态势持续向好，武汉疫情快速上升的趋势已得到遏制，湖北省除武汉以外的地区局部爆发的态势已基本遏制。但0增长并不等于零风险，中国疫情防控形势依然复杂，仍面临反弹的压力， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwiSZtJ1z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476990977084589:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476990977084589&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                                <a name="4476988624491152" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwiPciQlW?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 17:05" date="1582880729000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476988624491152:fromprofile"> 2月28日 17:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【调配医疗队 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BF%9D%E8%AF%81%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%8C%81%E7%BB%AD%E6%97%BA%E7%9B%9B%E7%9A%84%E6%88%98%E6%96%97%E5%8A%9B%23&amp;from=default">#保证医务人员持续旺盛的战斗力#</a>】国家卫健委医政医管局副局长焦雅辉：①合理科学的调配医疗资源。②以省包科，以院包科的形式，由重症医疗队整建制接管病区。③以省为单位，采取分片包干的形式，组建标准化的医疗、护理和检查的单元。④调配医疗队，保障医疗队轮换修整。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwiPciQlW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476988624491152:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476988624491152&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6247295586&amp;cid=4476988892906320&amp;nick=青晴子衿衣&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <!-- 赞 -->

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609308173&amp;ssig=JS30QL%2FQuV" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4476986917548575" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwiMrvFJd?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 16:58" date="1582880321000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476986917548575:fromprofile"> 2月28日 16:58</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%89%A9%E5%A4%A7%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E6%95%99%E5%B8%88%E6%8B%9B%E8%81%98%23&amp;from=default">#扩大中小学教师招聘#</a>】28日教育部副部长翁铁慧表示，将扩大重点领域招聘，特别是中小学教师。她强调，现在非常急需的是高中和幼儿园学前教育（教师）。同时要落实应届毕业师范生全部入编入岗。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a> 如果可以，你想成为哪个阶段的老师？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4476986917548575:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_337423_-_174350" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_337423_-_174350" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_337423_-_174350" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/muzi12345" usercard="id=2650649523">沐子沐子-爱生活</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member5"></em></a>：受当今价值观和社会风气的影响，近几年教师和医生被贬低，甚至被打骂的不胜枚举。而这次疫情教育了很多人，让人们认识到没有医生自己连命都保不住。而保住了命，孩子在家里蹲着，家长自己又没能力教，孩子什么也学不到。所以未来这两个职业地位上升并受到尊重是社会趋势。        </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=6288804256&amp;screen_name=我也不晓得卖了个啥子" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                                <a name="4476982244553714" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwiEUj6D0?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 16:40" date="1582879208000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476982244553714:fromprofile"> 2月28日 16:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【精锐出征！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%234%E4%B8%87%E5%A4%9A%E5%90%8D%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%23&amp;from=default">#4万多名医务人员驰援湖北#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>中央指导组成员、国家卫生健康委主任马晓伟介绍，从全国调派优秀医务人员驰援湖北，目前，各地选派超过4万名医务人员驰援湖北。其中，重症医学科、感染科、呼吸科、循环内科的专业人员就达到了16000多人，可以说是精锐出征、专家云集。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwiEUj6D0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476982244553714:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476982244553714&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E5%92%8C%E5%8D%B1%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%B9%B3%E5%9D%87%E5%B9%B4%E9%BE%8453%E5%B2%81%23&amp;from=default">#重症和危重症病例平均年龄53岁#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD3.6%E4%B8%87%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#全国3.6万治愈患者出院#</a>，占累计确诊病例的45.9%。对8400多份病例进行分析，临床分型中，轻型和普通型占比90.8%，重型7.2%，危重症2%。人群分布中，轻型病例平均年龄43岁，重症和危重症平均年龄53岁。可以看到，重症患者更多的是年龄较大人群。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iwivf5IPn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476976251363961:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476976251363961&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月28日 16:21</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A2337%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#韩国新冠肺炎累计确诊2337例#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>韩国中央防疫对策本部28日通报，截至当天下午4时，韩国较当天上午9时新增新冠肺炎确诊病例315例，累计确诊病例达2337例。与前一天下午4时相比，一天内增加病例571例。（人民日报） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%87%AA%E9%99%90%E6%80%A7%E7%96%BE%E7%97%85%E7%BB%9D%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%8D%E6%B2%BB%E8%80%8C%E6%84%88%E7%9A%84%E7%97%85%23&amp;from=default">#自限性疾病绝不是不治而愈的病#</a>】北京大学第一医院感染疾病科主任王贵强：自限性疾病绝不是不治而愈的病，对新冠病毒来讲，少部分病人确实会导致死亡，尤其是有基础病的老年人。少部分轻型病例有时在病程中会有急剧进展，目前对病因还不是特别清楚，所以强调<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BD%BB%E5%9E%8B%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E4%B9%9F%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E6%8E%89%E4%BB%A5%E8%BD%BB%E5%BF%83%23&amp;from=default">#轻型病例也不能掉以轻心#</a>。对新冠病毒而 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iwirezla6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476973768422830:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476973768422830&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4476972417220600" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwip3uipi?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 16:01" date="1582876865000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476972417220600:fromprofile"> 2月28日 16:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【直播：人民战 “疫”特别节目】国家卫健委统筹安排19个省份对口支援湖北省。在此次疫情中，山西医疗队拼“晋”全力，以一对三“硬核”支援湖北，从黄河之东的三晋大地，一路向南，与时间赛跑，为生命接力。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，关注直播↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4476972417220600:1034-video:1034%3A4479466337140768:page_100206_home:2286908003:4476972417220600:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67Gfa62" alt="http://t.cn/A67Gfa62" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%84%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E6%9C%89%E5%8F%98%E5%8C%96%23&amp;from=default">#新冠病毒传播路径是否有变化#</a>】科技部社会发展科技司司长吴远彬介绍：①<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%91%BC%E5%90%B8%E9%81%93%E9%A3%9E%E6%B2%AB%E5%AF%86%E5%88%87%E6%8E%A5%E8%A7%A6%E4%BB%8D%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%BB%E8%A6%81%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%84%23&amp;from=default">#呼吸道飞沫密切接触仍是主要传播路径#</a>；②新冠病人粪便标本中检测到新冠病毒毒株，提示粪口传播有一定风险，但传播能力和条件要进一步研究证实；③<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%94%E6%BA%B6%E8%83%B6%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E8%A6%81%E5%90%8C%E6%97%B6%E6%BB%A1%E8%B6%B3%E4%B8%89%E4%B8%AA%E6%9D%A1%E4%BB%B6%23&amp;from=default">#气溶胶传播要同时满足三个条件#</a>：密闭的空间、较长的时间、高浓度病毒，在极 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwiiE58q4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476968441224008:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476968441224008&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->

        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

                                <a name="4476966109640331" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IwieSErTd?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 15:36" date="1582875361000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476966109640331:fromprofile"> 2月28日 15:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E9%87%87%E9%9B%86544%E4%BA%BA%E6%AC%A1%E8%A1%80%E6%B5%86%23&amp;from=default">#全国已采集544人次血浆#</a> 用于245例患者临床治疗】截止目前，全国已采集了544人次的血浆，用于245例患者的临床治疗。对超过48小时的157例患者进行检测，其中91例临床指标和症状都有改善。多部门进一步出台政策，激励和鼓励更多的治愈出院患者献出血浆，使更多重症和危重症看到康复希望。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwieSErTd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476966109640331:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476966109640331&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4476961592071478" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwi7B8GSW?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 15:18" date="1582874284000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476961592071478:fromprofile"> 2月28日 15:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E5%A4%8D%E6%A3%80%E8%BD%AC%E9%98%B3%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%23&amp;from=default">#核酸复检转阳如何防控#</a>？】国家卫健委医政医管局监察专员郭燕红表示，2月17日，国家卫健委下发通知要求各地对出院患者进行跟踪随访。复诊发现阳性的这一部分患者没有再发生传染别人的现象，有一些患者再次检测时又转为阴性。新冠肺炎作为一个新的病毒，对于疾病的机理、全貌和病程的特点还需要加深 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iwi7B8GSW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476961592071478:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476961592071478&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_feed_detail clearfix" node-type="feed_content" style="background-image:url(//vip.storage.weibo.com/feed_cover/star_1218_pc_x2.png?version=8360e4a841c8aaec)">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609308182&amp;ssig=XGAex6RmmT" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4476960724206643" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iwi6chEl5?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-28 15:14" date="1582874077000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4476960724206643:fromprofile"> 2月28日 15:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%8A%E6%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E4%B8%80%E5%BE%8B%E9%87%87%E7%94%A8%E7%94%B5%E5%AD%90%E6%95%99%E6%9D%90%23&amp;from=default">#安徽中小学线上教学一律采用电子教材#</a>】3月2日起，安徽中小学校启动线上教育教学。要求一律采用电子教材；推广使用的线上教育资源一律不得向学生收取费用。同时，严禁各类搭车收费行为，学习空间不得发送与教育教学无关的内容，禁止进行商业宣传和误导学生参加校外培训等活动。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A67GLtzR" alt="http://t.cn/A67GLtzR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%234%E6%9C%888%E6%97%A5%E5%B9%B4%E5%BA%A6%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E6%BB%A1%E6%9C%88%23&amp;from=default">#4月8日年度最大满月#</a> 网友：待疫情结束一起去赏月<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%85%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%BB%93%E6%9D%9F%E5%86%8D%E7%9C%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%A5%BD%E6%B2%B3%E5%B1%B1%23&amp;from=default">#待疫情结束再看大好河山#</a>天文专家介绍，3月份天象精彩，“月合毕宿五”“年度第二大满月”“三星会月”“水星西大距”“金星东大距”等天象将轮番上演。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232020%E5%B9%B4%E6%9C%89%E5%9B%9B%E6%AC%A1%E8%B6%85%E7%BA%A7%E6%9C%88%E4%BA%AE%23&amp;from=default">#2020年有四次超级月亮#</a>，2月9日、3月10日，4月8日和5月7日，其中，4月8日的还是年度 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IwhWFhM1S" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4476954814236204:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4476954814236204&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx2.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2F884f7263ly1gcc3spdpyjj20sg0iydhp.jpg">
                        <li class="WB_pic li_1 S_bg1 S_line2 bigcursor  " action-data="isGoldenV=0&amp;isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gcc3spdpyjj20sg0iydhp&amp;object_ids=1042018%3Ae5b68a83c5f42952a60dbce4167f7936&amp;photo_tag_pids=&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4476954814236204&amp;pic_ids=884f7263ly1gcc3spdpyjj20sg0iydhp&amp;pic_objects=" action-type="feed_list_media_img" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_newimage_feed&amp;value=image_feed_unfold:4476954814236204:884f7263ly1gcc3spdpyjj20sg0iydhp:2286908003:0">

                                                                                 【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" 内蒙古军区捐14吨物资】近日，为了让武汉人民吃上新鲜的牛羊肉、奶制品，内蒙古军区和内蒙古自治区退役军人事务厅等单位联合捐赠了14吨牛羊肉、火锅底料等物资。工作人员说：“前段时间牛羊肉刚发出，火锅底料随后就到，咱内蒙捐物资都是成套的！”（人民铁道） ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/Iwkuzxj0Z\"                                                                                  【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" 解密垃圾处理全程】火神山医院自收治患者以来，院区每天产生约500桶各类垃圾，其中包括大量医疗废弃物。医护人员要把医废垃圾打包，封两次口，防止气溶胶喷出，送至专用的医废垃圾桶，然后在医院内进行无害化处理。<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民网\">\n                                                                                                                        【复工复产，来看各地“硬核”操作】江苏鼓励企业应用工业互联网平台在线复工复产；浙江全面启动“一图一码一指数”，建立起覆盖全省的复工复产监测体系；北京鼓励弹性工作制；甘肃供销联社专门建立紧急调运机制；福建出台九项举措防止农产品积压…各地为有序复工复产实招频出。<a
